name: Antrum (itch)
description:
Descend into a twisting aquatic cave network to vanquish the heart of an ancient evil in a rusting, harpoon equipped submarine.

Created for Ludum Dare 48. Links to the source code are available at the LD48 page.

Team:
Alex Ballantyne - Game Design and Implementation
Hilda Hay - Coding
Lucie Holloway - Creature Design, Art, Music
Rhea S. - Enemy AI
Moth Ingrid J. Walker - SFX Artist
